website_summaries.verdict: A good adjuster and massager to have on hand in a pinch. Budget friendly and convenient to keep around.
pros: Enables easy self-massaging and adjusting by applying gentle pressure with the device over sore areas
Fits the contours of the human body more readily than typical body massagers
cons: Doesn't deliver as deep of a massage

customer_reviews.title: Equivalent to Graston brand quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m a physical therapist and this is equivalent to similar handlebar tool from Graston kit. The weight of the tool and shape of the edge are perfect for instrument assisted soft tissue mobilization. It’s also easy and safe enough to educate patients to use on themselves without causing fatigue or aching of the hands. Very happy to have a high quality tool that didn’t require the purchase of a $2500 set! It’s still not a terribly cheap instrument but heavy duty, heavy weighted steel instruments that are quality enough to use in a clinic are rarely this cheap either! Worth the price tag
customer_reviews.author: jmpr

customer_reviews.title: If you want a truly professional grade product, this is it. It is as good as the $300 models from Grastin.
customer_reviews.text: I paid a little extra for the additional functionality and I'm very glad I did. I have problems all over my body -- knees, calves, hands, thumbs, arms, elbows, shoulders, back, and neck. This handy device handles it all.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as graston
customer_reviews.text: My OT uses Graston tools to help with scar tissue on my hand from a trauma and 4 surgeries. While this is not a graston tool, it is a spectacular and comfortable tool for me to use inbetween sessions.
customer_reviews.author: FuntimeFandrew

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i was seeing a physical therapist for some back and leg pain, i would joke with a friend who was also seeing the same therapist that she had used the brass knuckles on me that session. Anytime she used this i felt tension released in my back and legs. so when i stopped seeing her i picked this up to keep at home, anytime i feel like im getting tight i take this out and start working out those areas and it releases all the tension and i feel good again, yes its a little high in price but worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: tiny

customer_reviews.title: Great manual therapy tool
customer_reviews.text: A nice tool for manual therapy techniques. The size makes it really comfortable to hold for someone with big hands like me. It works well with oils/lotion and even just over clothing. The different edges allow for access to different parts of the body, specially on the scapular and upper back area.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsiders

customer_reviews.title: Not all stainless steel, came with chip marks
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid tool, but not completely stainless steel. It came with some chips and scratches (not sure that it's new, maybe came already used), so you can see that it's black beneath the shiny coating. While it's less expensive than some of the other graston tools out there, it's still a pricey item that shouldn't come damaged or less than adverised. Debating whether or not to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great weight, 4 edges in 1 tool, comfortable in hand
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tool and love the weight of it, the double beveled edges so you can move in both directions during IASTM. It feels comfortable in hand and will work great on larger muscle groups like ITB, Hamstrings and quad. group, gastric and back. Hopefully I can use it on upper traps but it may be a bit too heavy, large for that area depending on the persons bodyframe for application. I would highly recommend this 4 edges in 1 tool. It also comes in a nice leather case to protect it. I will be ordering more tools for other areas with smaller muscle groups from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Good Gua Sha tool for money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good thickness on both pieces. Cases are made of nice leather!!! High quality stainless steel! Works well on those knots and scarred fascia!!! Highly recommend this company -bought 2 Gua Sha tools from them and both have same quality steel (thick, smooth and good edges, not sharp!) and nice leather cases! Might be purchasing a 3rd from them!!
customer_reviews.author: nurseychic

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use as PT
customer_reviews.text: Work as a full time Physical Therapist. Use this every day. Have tried Many other STM tools and this is my favorite by far. Build quality appears medical grade. Only “complaint” is I would make the knob on the tool a little bigger, this one saves my thumb but has to be used carefully. Love the size of the tool! Fits in a pocket well and has all the right size edges for what I work on
customer_reviews.author: marc a gardner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool, good balance. BUT. Cheap fake case.
customer_reviews.text: The tool appears as expected, very nicely manufactured with no obvious defects. Good balance in hand. But the storage pouch that was advertised as "real leather" feels nasty. This is bonded leather at best. Kind of makes one take a closer look at the product itself. It could have been thicker in some spots, the balance could have been better. Not being able to compare to the top quality item some doubt regarding the quality lingers.
customer_reviews.author: Zapfdingbats

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool for different part of body
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I use it daily for my face, head, neck, and shoulders. There is nothing I could complain about except it is not strong enough against scratch. I use this in the steam room where tiles are on the floor. OfcourseI dropped it a couple of time to the floor and it made dent/scratches right away. The scratches are deep enough I can't use it to my skin. I now look at the area where no scratches when I use it. If you are not going to drop it to the cement/tiled area, this tool is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: soonnam Kwon

customer_reviews.title: I life saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this at home after seeing how helpful this tool has been for physical therapy for 2 total knee replacements. Use with a cream. My P.T. has shown me how to use it the correct way. There are also videos to watch. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Fits in hand, high quality and great thickness
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable in hand, thickness of metal is very good to rub soft tissue. I highly recommend this tool for arthritis... my chiropractor has one of these so I wanted to buy one I could use at home. Comes with nice leather case. I’m really happy with quality!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and I love it. In therapy they use between 2 and 5 different tools on me and this thing has them as in one and feels the same much cheaper then what they paid for theirs.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!!! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a miracle, I have my wife use it on my neck and shoulders.. I thought this may have been too expensive but its worth it. First time I tried it I was overjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Al fayez

customer_reviews.title: Great massage tool
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This tool is amazing. Before purchasing I watched some videos to help me decide which one I should get. Stainless steel is more hygienic because it could be cleaned throughly and sterilized. The many curves, offer different options to get into muscles. It’s a heavy tool but It gets in deeper. A must have for body workers
customer_reviews.author: Goozoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: I received advanced training on how to use this tool for myofascial adhesions. It is an excellent tool when used correctly, well designed and solid yet maneuverable metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and strong tool
customer_reviews.text: I love it thanks... I also like the rounded knob at the one end... good fit in the hand for gripping in different angles
customer_reviews.author: Remixed

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Myofascial release and taking care of my body is a Daily routine. I do most of the work myself so this little beauty has come in really handy. Really great for getting into tight spots. Great for my hands and feet. Get it, you’ll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Unable to have a firm grip on product while using
customer_reviews.text: I liked the device although with my arthritis in my hands the tool is very hard to hold & have a firm grip on. It to use effectively. I am going to unfortunately have to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for pain, tight muscles and tendons. It’s heavy and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Writer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Medical Grade
customer_reviews.text: easy to sanitize, As described and comes with a very nice leather pouch to store in.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a neck problem and when i put this work in i feel much better
customer_reviews.author: Louis C. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Great price / Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I own several IASTM tools - and this is by far one of the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality at low cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight and grip of this product. Does a fantastic job working with patients and allows my hands to rest. At a fraction of the cost of other certain name brand products, this one doesnt sacrifice quality. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of heavy maybe make it out of titaniun other than that it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: delk

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was using a plastic gua sha tool prior to purchasing this tool. This is so much more comfortable for me to use, with more options for use on different tissues. My patients are also finding this much easier to tolerate than the plastic tool. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth. A bit too small for my hands, causing fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This tool works wonderful on my legs and works cramps and knots out with only a couple of passes.
customer_reviews.author: David J Martin

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what this product was but it popped up in a search for something to help with my wife's sore feet. She can't believe how good it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Guasha scraping tool
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged nicely. Difficult to use on your own, but definitely helpful on my tense leg muscles.
customer_reviews.author: C. sim

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I use for soft tissue manipulation. As a lmt, I highly recommend this product. Make sure you learn properly how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great my daughter can get really good massages which do help her.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Newton

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tool Affordable Price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multipurpose tool for facial release on various plains. My PT Therapist was impressed by this tool. I recommend this tool for Facial Release technics used by massage and PT professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent guasha tool. It massages deeper to the muscle and it can be used from different angle. Excellent material!
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Just opened a PT clinic and wanted the best bang for my buck and this was it
customer_reviews.text: Just opened a PT clinic and wanted the best bang for my buck and this was it. I specialize in feet and ankles and this provides another tool to manage pain with many problems especially plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of equipment; covers those larger body surfaces well where a smaller tool will take much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This tool + loving wife treating my neck is a life changer. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the right tool for soft tissue mobilization in the areas I wanted to treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: This tool is amazing! I have used it on feet (plantar fasciitis), lower legs, lower arms, neck & shoulders or back. Excellent myofascial release tool with a variety of edges to work with including a targeted point for smaller knots. Works well with coconut oil or other medium. Cleans easily. Packs flat and easily travels in a bag pocket for the traveling athlete, active adult or Soldier.
customer_reviews.author: prairielover

customer_reviews.title: its wasn't that good,,
customer_reviews.text: its wasn't that good ,,, Not sharp at all ,,, I loved the handle shape ,,, easy to be handled ,,, but not sharp as I said and doesn't fit as a massage tool sorry for my review but its true
customer_reviews.author: Adham

customer_reviews.title: Dis-*u%cin$-pleased
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only thing inside of my package was packing paper and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Macris

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not often compelled to leave a product review so quickly. . . But this tool arrived just an hour ago and man am I happy. Extremely appealing to the eye and has some serious weight behind it. Every edge is wonderful. The workability is awesome. Did a little self therapy upon opening it. As soon as you put this tool in your hands its honestly almost automatic. I am very happy to have purchased this tool and should highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how well this works.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how well this tool would work on my legs, to seek out and break down scar tissue and knots. The tightness in my legs is now gone as result of working out muscle kinks and knots with this tool. It's better if you have someone else use it on you, but you can use it on your self as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Erroneous

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research trying to find the right one because as you may know, these things range anywhere from $15.00 to $150.00. This product is 100% worth the money. It feels great in the hand, it’s made of solid material, and comes with a nice leather case. I’ve been bringing it around with me to work and have noticed that my muscles do not feel as tight as they were before consistent use. Highly recommend. Don’t get sucked into buying the expensive brand-name scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: As an ex LMT, massage therapist I was hoping to find a help & relief for my hips. NO... Sorry! Hard to hold to perform friction, arm & hand get tired very quickly while rubbing on yourself and doesn't bring a desirable effect! I'll stick with my massage tools/pistol gun instead. Plus, it's not so practical in terms of lubricating yourself all over, taking clothe off, etc. I'll give it away or return!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Almost identical to other well known branded IASTM instruments
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add another one of these handle bar type tools to use at my clinic. This had the appearance of being like another well known brand that is very expensive that we already have so I thought I'd try it for the price. when it arrived it is almost a copy of it. There are only minor differences and it works well. Happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: minnesotaphotog

customer_reviews.title: ST003
customer_reviews.text: update 9/30/2018 updated to five stars from four. The length is fine. Longer would be slightly better. I taped the handles with gaff tape for better handling. My skin doesn't have any adverse reactions to the metal. I like it. It isn’t super sharp and it isn’t super dull. I’m a tall guy, so I wish it was a little longer. One side is flat and the other side is rounded. The bevel is maybe 35ish degrees.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Yes- but this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! I'm a guasha therapist and It's my first step up from stone. It did not disappoint. I know some here complain about the "sharpness" of it, but that was the selling point for me. It does the job well! I don't like the thick edges of other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jim 'n Ty

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool that really does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something portable. Nice solid stainless steel! Perfect for working the tendon and muscle kinks out of my legs after having hip replacement surgery a while back. When used properly, hurts like heck. But feels much better after doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgeteer

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Feels great to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality! Fits in the hand nicely. Great size for face, hands wrists and lower arms. I love these gushes tools!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Professional
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use on my leg by myself but working on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry with you, comes with case for easy storage after use.
customer_reviews.text: I like it had more than one surface to use to treat individuals. Cleans easily maintaining its high polished finish.
customer_reviews.author: Silly

customer_reviews.title: I love this. When I've been on the computer too ...
customer_reviews.text: My Chiropractor used this on my elbow when I had some pain. I love this. When I've been on the computer too long and my pain flairs up, I use this and though it is a bit painful to use, the benefits far outweigh the pain I experience during use.
customer_reviews.author: BMRW

customer_reviews.title: Great For IT Band Massage
customer_reviews.text: I have had a terrible problem with an IT Band issue I've had for the last three years, this is perfect to massage it. I use it several times a week. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped scar tissue restriction on knee.
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was made to address post operative knee replacement scar tissue. My range of motion increase significantly. I seemed most successful at addressing the area above my patella. Tool is sturdy. Different shapes help me address different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to fit in the hand,
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to fit in the hand, I feel this helps with my strained ligaments in my knee replacement
customer_reviews.author: k tenges

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Equal to
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Equal to, or better than many other ASTIM tool I have used at less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: DRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this tool is strong and sturdy. Helping me with sore muscles
customer_reviews.author: lkanoa80

customer_reviews.title: Great "graston" like tool
customer_reviews.text: Great 'Graston' like tool. As a PT using both this and the graston tool in a clinic, I find these just as beneficial and ordered them for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to control and comfortable to use it
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy, easy to control and comfortable to use it.I like to use it .
customer_reviews.author: WaI Au

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Dealing with Heel Pain
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver. Has really helped with combo heel spur/Achilles tendon issue. The shape is perfect for feet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool! High quality and does a great job with soft tissue mobilization.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for hamstrings & calf
customer_reviews.text: this i great - just what i needed for my hamstrings & calf
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Based on the body area size, girth, it was not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well done perfect. Arrived befor
customer_reviews.text: Sono rimasto molto contento. 5 strumenti in uno. Efficace e pratico. Well done perfect. Arrived befor. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: luigi
